nodes.text: Chukha-Trok, also called Chukha, was an Ewok that lived on the moon Endor, who participated in a hunting expedition with Ra-Lee and Chirpa. Chukha-Trok set a trap that Ra-Lee and Chirpa drove the boar-wolf they were hunting into. After capturing the boar-wolf, the trio of hunters returned home to Bright Tree Village, expecting to be welcomed as heroes because their boar-wolf was the largest that even Chirpa's father, Chief Buzza had ever seen.

In the current Star Wars canon, Chukha-Trok first appeared in the non-canonical 2015 video game Disney Infinity 3.0 before canonically appearing in the 2018 comic book Star Wars Adventures: Tales from Vader's Castle 4. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Chukha-Trok first appeared in the 1984 film Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure.
